segments.text: I see the boy balancing on that stool, and my heart races.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s stretching so far, and the stool is already tilting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is right there, ready to catch whatever he drops.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe the woman is just standing there, drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is everywhere, and she doesn’t even care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so focused on the cookies, he doesn’t realize how dangerous this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so excited, like this is the best moment ever.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the stool is going to tip any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole kitchen is a mess, and no one seems to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR
